Summary  
Mechanical engineer with 4 years experience working in industry within a 
global manufacturing and industrial process equipment supplier providing a 
range of solutions in a wide range of industries. Specialized in fluid mixing 
equipment design, testing, inspection and quality assurance. Proficient in 
designing, selecting, costing and pricing of equipment whilst conforming to 
customer specifications and local legislations. Experience in product design 
projects and managing responses to tendering enquiries. Seeking to build 
upon my current experience, find new challenges and acquire new skills.  
 
Highlights  
• Proven adaptability across product development and application 
engineering disciplines with an in -depth knowledge of fluid mixing 
technologies  and a strong grounding in equipment selection and 
equipment design.  
• Ability to develop and sustain good relations with colleagues, customers 
and suppliers across the globe.  
• Good working familiarity with local and global safety legislation. Mindful of 
cost and profit considerations.  
• Good ability to manage mixed workloads from multiple departments 
including enquiries and projects.
